reviewText: I hired a personal coach one time, the kind that help you get past your limiting beliefs. It is just about the same kind of talk here. I personally do not agree with everything he said, but the one thing I took from this dvd is that clients return because you helped them solve their issue (pain). There are helpful suggestions and it is worth sharing. I can't say I got anything I didn't previously know, but that it is packaged together with a goal in mind and that was helpful. Not five stars because massage marketing is not as easy as it looks and I was hoping for something I hadn't thought of already.
